Do these features remain constant or cha.yes: You can include these features in bTrack. The tracker will combine motion data and feature information for improved tracking accuracy.
Do these features remain constant or cha.no: Abrupt changes in these features could disrupt bTrack's performance and prematurely end trajectories. It's better to rely only on motion data and avoid using features.

Are morphological, tonal, or textural fe.no: There's no need to include features. The tracking will use only the positions of the cells. You can skip this step.
